entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
